What happens to the caster of a failed spell casting?
The caster of a failed spell casting must still pay the Sanity point and Magic point costs.

Can the Keeper consult the charts for the consequences of a failed casting roll for inspiration?
Yes, the Keeper may consult the charts for the consequences of failing a pushed casting roll for inspiration on what might happen.
